exmls.content:
<?xml version="1.0" encoding="utf-8"?>
<e:Skin class="skins.ScrollerSkin" minWidth="20" minHeight="20" xmlns:e="http://ns.egret.com/eui">
    <e:VScrollBar id="verticalScrollBar" height="100%" right="0"/>
</e:Skin>

<?xml version="1.0" encoding="utf-8"?>
<e:Skin class="skins.VScrollBarSkin" minWidth="8" minHeight="20" xmlns:e="http://ns.egret.com/eui">
    <e:Image id="thumb" source="roundthumb_png" scale9Grid="3,3,2,2" height="30" width="8" horizontalCenter="0"/>
</e:Skin>

<?xml version='1.0' encoding='utf-8'?>
<e:Skin class="GameSceneSkin" width="640" height="1136" xmlns:e="http://ns.egret.com/eui" xmlns:w="http://ns.egret.com/wing" xmlns:ns1="*">
	<e:Image id="bg" source="game_bg_png" left="0" right="0" top="0" bottom="0"/>
	<e:Group id="fallPacketGroup" height="1150" width="640"/>
	<e:Image id="item_box" source="game_item0_png" x="-151" y="127"/>
	<e:Image id="item_ipad" source="game_item1_png" x="466" y="372"/>
	<e:Image id="item_paper" source="game_item2_png" x="310" y="70"/>
	<e:Group id="handGroup" height="515" width="640" x="0" y="620" touchEnabled="false" touchThrough="true">
		<e:Image id="hand" source="game_hand_png" x="45" y="0"/>
		<e:Image id="ruleBtn" source="game_rule_png" x="273" y="180"/>
	</e:Group>
	<e:Image id="arrow" source="game_arrow_png" y="394" x="274"/>
	<e:Image id="staticPacket" source="game_packet_png" y="1145" x="121"/>
	<e:Group id="countGroup" height="1136" width="640" x="0" y="0" touchChildren="false" touchEnabled="false" touchThrough="true"/>
	<e:Group id="labelGroup" height="1136" width="640" x="0" y="0" touchThrough="true" touchEnabled="false" touchChildren="false">
		<e:Image id="timebg" source="game_timebg_png" y="89" x="205"/>
		<e:Image id="moneybg" source="game_moneybg_png" y="20" x="205"/>
		<e:Label id="packetLabel" text="999" y="23" width="150" height="50" verticalAlign="middle" textAlign="center" textColor="0xFFFFFF" horizontalCenter="0" size="35"/>
		<e:Label id="timeLabel" y="92" text="999" width="150" height="50" verticalAlign="middle" textAlign="center" textColor="0xFFFFFF" x="245" size="35"/>
	</e:Group>
</e:Skin>

<?xml version='1.0' encoding='utf-8'?>
<e:Skin class="OpenSceneSkin" width="640" height="1136" xmlns:e="http://ns.egret.com/eui" xmlns:w="http://ns.egret.com/wing">
	<e:Image id="bg" source="open_bg_png" width="640" x="0" height="1136" y="0"/>
	<e:Image id="shareBtn" source="game_bag_png" x="558" y="-15"/>
	<e:Group id="openGroup" height="1136" width="640" x="0" y="0" touchEnabled="false" touchThrough="true">
		<e:Rect id="openBtn" height="188" width="192" x="224" y="370"/>
		<e:Image id="openBg" source="open_open_png" y="538" x="320" touchEnabled="false" anchorOffsetX="273" anchorOffsetY="308"/>
		<e:Image id="ruleBtn" source="open_rule_png" y="722" x="213"/>
	</e:Group>
	<e:Group id="openedGroup" height="1136" width="640" x="0" y="-40" touchEnabled="false" touchThrough="true">
		<e:Image id="opened_openedBg_up" source="open_opened2.png_png" x="48" y="205" touchEnabled="false"/>
		<e:Image id="prize1" source="prize1_png" x="-3" y="30" touchEnabled="false"/>
		<e:Image id="prize2" source="prize2_png" x="0" y="51" touchEnabled="false"/>
		<e:Image id="prize3" source="prize3_png" x="0" y="24"/>
		<e:Image id="prize4" source="prize4_png" x="18" y="-40"/>
		<e:Image id="prize5" source="prize5_png" x="-2" y="36"/>
		<e:Image id="prize6" source="prize6_png" x="-16" y="38"/>
		<e:Image id="prize7" source="prize7_png" x="-2" y="38"/>
		<e:Image id="openedBg" x="48" y="208" touchEnabled="false" source="open_opened.png_png"/>
		<e:Image id="againBtn" source="opened_open_png" x="236" y="617"/>
		<e:Image id="myPrizeBtn" source="opened_myPrize_png" y="841" x="213"/>
		<e:Label id="prizeResultLabel" x="48" y="533" width="545" verticalAlign="middle" textAlign="center" fontFamily="微软雅黑" size="25"/>
	</e:Group>
	<e:Group id="phoneGroup" height="1136" width="640" x="0" y="0">
		<e:Rect id="phoneRect" height="1136" width="640" x="0" y="0" fillAlpha="0.7"/>
		<e:Rect id="submitBtn" height="46" width="190" x="223" y="557"/>
		<e:Image source="prize_phone_png" y="378" touchEnabled="false" x="89"/>
		<e:EditableText id="phoneLabel" width="354" height="48" x="136" y="429" textColor="0x000000" verticalAlign="middle" textAlign="center"/>
	</e:Group>
	<e:Label text="技术支持：信步游戏" width="360" verticalAlign="middle" textAlign="center" fontFamily="微软雅黑" bottom="45" x="140"/>
</e:Skin>

<?xml version='1.0' encoding='utf-8'?>
<e:Skin class="PreloadSceneSkin" width="640" height="1136" xmlns:e="http://ns.egret.com/eui" xmlns:w="http://ns.egret.com/wing">
	<e:Image id="anim1" source="load_anim1_png" x="211" y="266"/>
	<e:Image id="anim0" source="load_anim0_png" x="221" y="265"/>
	<e:Image id="barbg" source="load_barbg_png" y="460" x="91"/>
	<e:Image id="bar" source="load_bar_png" y="460" x="92" anchorOffsetX="0" anchorOffsetY="0"/>
	<e:Image id="anim2" source="load_anim2_png" x="208" y="269"/>
	<e:Image id="anim3" source="load_anim3_png" x="208" y="267"/>
	<e:Label id="progressLabel" text="100%" y="497" textColor="0xEACB21" fontFamily="Arial" width="164" verticalAlign="middle" textAlign="center" x="238"/>
	<e:Label text="技术支持：信步游戏" fontFamily="微软雅黑" textAlign="center" width="360" verticalAlign="middle" x="150" bottom="65" textColor="0xFAFAF6"/>
</e:Skin>

<?xml version='1.0' encoding='utf-8'?>
<e:Skin class="CountDownUISkin" width="640" height="1136" xmlns:e="http://ns.egret.com/eui" xmlns:w="http://ns.egret.com/wing">
	<e:Rect height="1136" width="640" x="0" y="0" fillAlpha="0.8"/>
	<e:Image id="num3" source="count3_png" y="177" x="206"/>
	<e:Image id="num2" source="count2_png" x="204" y="180"/>
	<e:Image id="num1" source="count1_png" x="214" y="172"/>
	<e:Image source="count_rule_png" y="532" x="81"/>
</e:Skin>

<?xml version='1.0' encoding='utf-8'?>
<e:Skin class="MyPrizeUISkin" width="640" height="1136" xmlns:e="http://ns.egret.com/eui" xmlns:w="http://ns.egret.com/wing">
	<e:Rect height="1136" width="640" x="0" y="0" fillAlpha="0.7"/>
	<e:Rect id="okBtn" height="52" width="198" x="230" y="565"/>
	<e:Image source="prize_result_png" x="100" y="264" touchEnabled="false"/>
	<e:Label id="contentLabel" text="标签" x="130" y="336" width="394" height="218" textColor="0x471717"/>
</e:Skin>

<?xml version='1.0' encoding='utf-8'?>
<e:Skin class="ResultUISkin" width="640" height="1136" xmlns:e="http://ns.egret.com/eui" xmlns:w="http://ns.egret.com/wing">
	<e:Rect height="1136" width="640" x="0" y="0" fillAlpha="0.7"/>
	<e:Rect id="openPacketBtn" height="150" width="150" x="247" y="402"/>
	<e:Rect id="prizeBtn" height="62" width="218" x="352" y="580"/>
	<e:Rect id="againBtn" height="66" width="212" x="78" y="579"/>
	<e:Image id="resultbg" source="game_resultbg_png" y="230" x="38" touchEnabled="false"/>
	<e:Image id="shareBtn" source="game_bag_png" x="559" y="-15" touchEnabled="true"/>
	<e:Label id="packetLabel" text="99" x="299" y="261" width="92" verticalAlign="middle" textAlign="center" size="40"/>
	<e:Label id="countLabel" text="你数了xxx个红包" y="308" width="398" height="44" verticalAlign="middle" textAlign="center" x="121"/>
	<e:Label id="fightLabel" y="352" text="打败了xxxx个人" textAlign="center" verticalAlign="middle" width="398" height="44" x="121"/>
</e:Skin>

<?xml version='1.0' encoding='utf-8'?>
<e:Skin class="RuleUISkin" width="640" height="1136" xmlns:e="http://ns.egret.com/eui" xmlns:w="http://ns.egret.com/wing">
	<e:Rect height="1136" width="640" x="0" y="0" fillAlpha="0.7"/>
	<e:Image id="bg" source="rule_bg_png" y="127" x="90"/>
	<e:Scroller id="scroller" width="373" height="487" x="129" y="208" skinName="skins.ScrollerSkin">
		<e:Group>
			<e:Image source="rule_content_png" x="12" y="0"/>
		</e:Group>
	</e:Scroller>
	<e:Image id="okBtn" source="rule_btn_png" y="729" x="223"/>
</e:Skin>

<?xml version='1.0' encoding='utf-8'?>
<e:Skin class="ShareUISkin" width="640" height="1150" xmlns:e="http://ns.egret.com/eui" xmlns:w="http://ns.egret.com/wing">
	<e:Rect height="1136" width="640" x="0" y="0" fillAlpha="0.7"/>
	<e:Image id="haveChance" source="share0_png" x="127" y="18"/>
	<e:Image id="noChance" source="share1_png" x="126" y="17"/>
</e:Skin>
